name: Deeply Digital
description:
Deeply Digital is a no-nonsense digital marketing agency based in Leamington Spa.
We specialise in the art of content, content promotion and marketing technology for enterprises with complex B2B sales.
We are a Marketo partner, a Platinum HubSpot partner and ranked #1 in Europe for customer happiness (by HubSpot). We're also the Digital Strategy partner for the PRCA.
